harvest-enchantment.midnightconfig.title: Harvest Enchantment
harvest-enchantment.midnightconfig.AUTO_: Attempt to automatically register non-vanilla crops.
harvest-enchantment.midnightconfig.HARVE:
List of crops that can be harvested.
Format: "harvestState[,afterHarvest]", i.e. "minecraft:wheat[age=7]" or "minecraft:cocoa[age=2,facing=north],minecraft:cocoa[age=0,facing=north]"
How much to expand the harvesting range for each level of enchantment.
